titleSection.name: VersionOne CruiseControlNETPublisher1.6andAbove Integration
titleSection.shortDescription: Link agile workitems to tangible, working software in the form of builds.

descriptionSection.description: The VersionOne CruiseControl.NET publisher creates a record of CruiseControl.NET builds in VersionOne, so the development teams can quickly view builds associated with a story or defects. This visibility is useful when identifying what build to use for verification or when generating release notes.

updates.releaseNotes:
* Added: Support for connecting to VersionOne through a proxy. 
 * Added: Support for CruiseControl.NET 1.6. 
 Note: Due to API changes in CruiseControl.NET, the new integration is not backward compatible. The integration for previous versions will continue to be available as a separate download.

qualityBands.name: seed
qualityBands.shortDesc: The initial idea of a product. No working code.

qualityBands.name: sapling
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

qualityBands.name: mature
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.
